name: VeevSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen Light”
”Alexa, Open Kitchen Blinds”
”Alexa, All Kitchen Lights On”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Veev provides our homeowners with a pre-integrated and personalized smart hub experience. Our app brings simplicity to your entire home operation with the touch of a finger.

Control and adjust lighting, blinds, fans, temperature, doorbell and external locks from every room throughout your home.
Create ideal custom modes; a pre-set group of operations, for added efficiency and repeatability. 
Operate your individually zoned heating and cooling preference per room for enhanced comfort. 
Securely monitor and lock all entry points throughout your home and grant access to others through virtual keys.

The Veev app provides a hassle-free connected home experience with no prior utility setup required. Simply verify your personal information upon move-in and start operating your home from your mobile device and built-in touch panels. Your Veev floor plan will be pre-installed in the application allowing you to rename and personalize your entire home environment. You are given the ability to operate by house, by floor, by room, and even down to an individual appliance or fixture.

Welcome to our exceptional way of living!

*Skill is only accessible and operational for Veev homeowners
*Available home operations vary dependent upon each residential development
